WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please, for this type of question, open a «Discussion» instead of an «Issue».
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I'm trying to deploy LibreOffice on Windows from Vista to 10.
I'm using 5.0.4 msi.

I don't have any error message, in WU.log or the Event viewer.
Deployment seems to be fine but in reality nothing is installed.

With or without parameters (i'm trying with REMOVE=gm_o_Onlineupdate), it's the same.
If i'm trying to deploy the msi from the command line, it works.

Tested with Vista x86, 7 x64, 8x64 and 10 x86/x64.
I allowed user interactions.

Extract from WU.log file :
> 2016-02-08 16:17:09:758 2556 778 Handler ::::::::::::: 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:09:758 2556 778 Handler :: START :: Handler: MSI Install 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:09:758 2556 778 Handler ::::::::: 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:09:758 2556 778 Handler : Updates to install = 1 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:09:805 2556 778 Handler MSI update {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}.0 using source image from 1 CABs. 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:14:704 2556 778 Handler : Batch installing 1 updates 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:14:719 2556 778 Handler List of MSPs in transaction: 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:14:719 2556 778 Handler List of Transforms in transaction: 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:14:719 2556 778 Handler MSI final command line: REMOVE=gm_o_Onlineupdate ALLUSERS=1 MSIRESTARTMANAGERCONTROL=Disable REBOOT=REALLYSUPPRESS 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:57:494 2556 778 Handler : MSI transaction completed. MSI: 0x00000000, Handler: 0x00000000, Source: No, Reboot: 0 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:57:509 2556 778 Handler ::::::::: 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:57:509 2556 778 Handler :: END :: Handler: MSI Install 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:57:509 2556 778 Handler ::::::::::::: 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:57:556 1200 d38 AU >>## RESUMED ## AU: Installing update [UpdateId = {AA57C935-8E2D-4645-9932-65053FC6529F}, succeeded] 
> 2016-02-08 16:17:57:619 1200 d60 Agent *********

Any idea ?

Thanks.

Comments.Message:
Sorry, should have posted in discussion.
You can close this one.
